channel.title: Comments on: Banana Maple Tigernut Muffins (Top 8 Free & Coconut-Free)

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/banana-maple-tiger-nut-muffins/#comment-383">Debra</a>.
So happy to hear you enjoyed the muffins! Always great to hear about personal adjustments and how it worked out for you.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Debra.

So happy to hear you enjoyed the muffins! Always great to hear about personal adjustments and how it worked out for you.

item.title: By: Debra
item.dc:creator: Debra
item.description: Love these! I don’t add as much maple syrup and they are plenty sweet from the tigernut. Hit the spot!!
item.content:encoded: Love these! I don’t add as much maple syrup and they are plenty sweet from the tigernut. Hit the spot!!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/banana-maple-tiger-nut-muffins/#comment-371">Tracy</a>.
Thank you for your review! So happy to hear you enjoy the muffins.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tracy.

Thank you for your review! So happy to hear you enjoy the muffins.

item.title: By: Tracy
item.dc:creator: Tracy
item.description: These are just delicious. I’ve tried many an AIP muffin and the taste and texture for these was perfect. Thanks a million!
item.content:encoded: These are just delicious. I’ve tried many an AIP muffin and the taste and texture for these was perfect. Thanks a million!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/banana-maple-tiger-nut-muffins/#comment-27">Vincent</a>.
Thank you, so happy you enjoyed the muffins!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Vincent.

Thank you, so happy you enjoyed the muffins!

item.title: By: Vincent
item.dc:creator: Vincent
item.description: It is so hard to find allergy friendly baked goods that are actually soft and fluffy. I enjoyed it. Thanks for this great recipe!
item.content:encoded: It is so hard to find allergy friendly baked goods that are actually soft and fluffy. I enjoyed it. Thanks for this great recipe!
